New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 93 runs in the match
India won the match by 10 wickets
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal formed a 67-run partnership
Key Match Events: India sealed the series 3-1 with this win
Zimbabwe's batting performance was overshadowed by India's efficient chase
Washington Sundar was awarded Player of the Match
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill won the toss and elected to bat first
Zimbabwe's predicted XI included Sikandar Raza as captain
India's predicted XI included Shubman Gill, Yashasvi Jaiswal, and Washington Sundar
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill praised the team's performance
Washington Sundar expressed confidence in the team's spinners
Sikandar Raza highlighted the need for better fielding
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tushar Deshpande made his debut for India in this match
Abhishek Sharma and Ruturaj Gaikwad were part of India's batting lineup
The match was significant for India's top-order batting options
